data.name: Nekomancer: Seeded by Darkness
data.detailed_description:
Embark on an adventure as an adorable Nekomancer! A user of powerful magic with lusty properties that'll cause countless lewd effects upon your enemies. Battle in a realm of Beasts, Slimes, Wolf girls, Mimics and so much more!

There are many abilities and weapons you'll find during your adventure. Cast magical projectiles at oncoming enemies, wield stones that grant you elemental powers, shoot fire balls or douse your target with a hydro blast!

Charm your enemies with the Nekomancers special charm attack! Even big bad bosses can't resist your temptations. Once they are down, you are free to do with them as you please.

Collect Summoning Stones to raise powerful companions. Each one grants you elemental attacks and perks, such as flying, climbing ledges, or dashing! It’s always nice to be flexible during sticky situations.

Dark forces seek to take your power! Will you submit to them? Or will you take hold of the staff of The Nekomancer!

data.short_description: The Nekomancer is an Adult Adventure Zelda like game, You play as "Avery" a Femboy Catboy Nekomancer, a user of magic with Lustful properties! In this top down Pixel art style game, you choose to eliminate or seduced the enemies you encounter during your epic Quest!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or Greater
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core CPU
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains depictions of highly erotic sexual, mostly Male focused homoerotic, sexual content. All characters depicted are over the age of 18.
